PEX - Program Manager Module

PEX is a media management module for OpenBroadcaster. This module extends the media model to provide:

  • media metadata, including production credits, content licensing, copyright, CanCon and parental advisory labels
  • Program Manager to assemble episodes and assign images to the program gallery
  • scheduling of Programs as a Series

The Program Manager can be used to produce episodes from playlists, including assembly of tracklists from a dynamic playlist, as a single media file or podcast. Program episodes can be scheduled as a series of shows.

Documentation for Program Manager
